text: Placed an order, and was told forty minutes for delivery. It took an hour and twenty minutes to get to my house. The chicken tasted 'stale'. Food was just warm, not hot at all. I'd suggest not adding a tip online beforehand.

text: The crust is by far the best thing about hungry Howie's...the pizza itself is mehh.. but gotta hand it to them no one can quite do a pizza crust like homie Howie over here. I occasionally like to get a calzones from here if pizza isn't cutting it for me...calzones are very worth it and are extremely large....never can finish them.

text: Ordered for delivery online for the first time from this location, Aaron our delivery driver was amazing, called to let us know he was here, ordered at 11:20pm and was here by midnight. The pizza, salad, and Howie bread are all perfectly done! So happy. Thank you!
